question: How many Zimbabwean state universities had Innovation Hubs established in 2018
A patent is a...
optionA: New business entity, i.e. a new company formed to commercialize one or more related inventions generated from the research work from HIT.
optionB: Permission that the owner or controller of intellectual property grants to another party.
optionC: Legal document that describes an invention and grants a property rights to the inventor(s) or owner.
optionD: Way by which TTLCC grants rights in a certain product or technology to a third party in a certain field of activity, and for a certain period
answer: Legal document that describes an invention and grants a property rights to the inventor(s) or owner
